title: Cake for Charity
body:
Hi All
Would like to propose that PCS implement a level of charity so certain organizations can be supported by the PCS platform(and its users)

Thinking it would work something like this:
- 5k or similar $USD is set as monthly charity 
- The team at PCS nominates 2-3 Charities(or ask the community to submit ideaseg via Telegram or vote) 
- A vote is held for PCS Community to select the charity that is to be supported(Charity must support crypto payments)
- Some Cake from buyback /burn activities (ie lotto, predictor, buyback)is allocated to the charity
- Once winner is selected, Convertthe $5k to Accepted Crypto for chariy
- Show back donation evidence to Community
- Repeat

Its not a lot of money, and also will not contribute a lot to burn BUT it will make a difference and we can do more good and help people with PCS
What do you think??
choices: Yes, lets help people with Cake
author: 0x43E4BFb91d2cF69431562B152CE300bE8bdd4A4E
